description:
In this course, I provide step by step instruction on how to handicap horses. Horse Racing has been an important part of my life for over 30 years, and I want to share the knowledge that I have attained in over 3 decades to help people successfully handicap on their own. These videos will allow you to take Horse Wagering and Handicapping into your own hands by giving you the information necessary to confidently pick the horse that will have the best chance to make you a profit. In addition to the videos, at a cost of $25 an hour, you also have the opportunity to get one on one tutoring from Mr. D himself. This video is not only for people new to the horse racing scene. It can be a helpful tool for avid betters who may want to increase the damount of money that they win, and the amount of longshots that they

•These Videos are designed to provide information on Horse Racing and Horse Handicapping. It is sold with the understanding that the author or publisher is not providing tax, accounting, legal, investment, business or other professional advice. Horse Handicapping can be risky.

•Information in Horse Racing Terminology video was partially extracted from and inspired by the sportsbettingacumen website.
title: Horse Betting Handicappers School
